Windlord:

Windlord opened comm link to Axis "I'm going to help you" and after 
that he lookred to Lynzix "Are you ok Lynzix?"  and he walked towards 
her in order to hel her.


--- In nbwrpg@y..., "rAuq" <rauq@t...> wrote:
> --- Axis & Co. / Lynxiz ---
> 
> Axis jets up tears up to the Chivitron base, the pod remnants 
> attached to the back. He waits for Lokk and Seekker to detatch 
> and remove the bindings.
> 
> Lokk detatches and transforms into robot mode. "Seekker, inform 
> Aerotaur, and Windlord that we've arrived with the pod. I'll get 
Axis 
> untangled." Lokk begins to unattach the high stress cords that 
> they had used to keep the pod in place. As soon as he finishes, 
> Axis transforms, and faces the pod, saying quietly, "Interesting."
> 
> At the same time, 
> In a Chivitron CR chamber, the sequence finishes, and Lynxiz 
> steps out of the chamber with a dizzy disoriented stumble. She 
> makes her way to find Windlord and Aerotaur, not thinking to 
> comm them. She heads to the control center.
